posts.post_title: N28 Allen & Ginter  psa graded cards!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Dave's Vintage Baseball Cards
Picked up some nice Allen & Ginter cards.  Have had them graded by psa and sgc.  Have baseball players, boxers, wrestlers, and pool players as well as some that were already in my inventory!

They can be viewed at my site here:  [url]http://gfg.com/baseball/ginter.shtml[/url]

Here are the baseball cards that are available now!


[IMG]http://www.gfg.com/baseball/n28.jpg[/IMG]


Thanks for looking.

Dave
gfg@gfg.com
